summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northwest, Seventeenth Avenue Northwest, and Eighteenth Avenue Northwest, each from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, manholes, lampholes, catch basins, inlets and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 1596 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
